nodes.text: The Lobeha Mwadu was the largest dance performed by the Aki-Aki during the Festival of the Ancestors on the planet Pasaana. It was the centerpiece attraction at every instance of the festival. At one Festival of the Ancestors in 35 ABY, a large number of Aki-Aki festival-goers performed the dance at the same time that several Resistance members visited Pasaana on a mission.
